subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Justin Gatlin, the 2004 Olympic champion, won his third 100-meter race since returning from a four-year doping ban, clocking 10.28 seconds into a strong headwind at the Joensuu Games in Helsinki, Finland.
snippet: Justin Gatlin, the 2004 Olympic champion, won his third 100-meter race since returning from a four-year doping ban, clocking 10.28 seconds into a strong headwind at the Joensuu Games in Helsinki, Finland.
